SpellDef.Description:
Converts 500 Gildar into a random amount of Horses (Min: 42, Max: 100)
See Tooltip.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[S] BUY HORSES (-500 GILDAR) ::: Converts 500 Gildar into a random amount of Horses (Min: 42, Max: 100)
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Self
EFFECT ::: - 500 Gildar ::: + [42,100] Horses
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Instant
OTHER ::: Caster must be Sov ::: Player Only
SOURCE ::: All
